article_title: Why Chinese Steel Exports Are Stirring Protests
article_text:
China’s massive steel-making engine, determined to keep humming as growth cools at home, is flooding the world with exports, spurring steel producers around the globe to seek government protection from falling prices.

From the European Union to Korea and India, China’s excess metal supply is upending trade patterns and heating up turf battles...

twitter.description: China’s mills keep producing in the face of weak demand, and sell the excess abroad, leading to calls in the U.S. and EU for tariffs.
twitter.creator: @wsjmiller

image.alt: Why Chinese steel exports are stirring protests

From the European Union to Korea and India, China’s excess metal supply is upending trade patterns and heating up turf battles...
China’s massive steel-making engine, determined to keep humming as growth cools at home, is flooding the world with exports, spurring steel producers around the globe to seek government protection from falling prices.
